website_summaries.verdict: This concealer palette is versatile, easy to mix and match, and guaranteed to last all day long. It's absolutely worth the investment.
pros: Each palette has five colors for mixing to find your perfect shade
cons: Pricey compared to other tattoo concealers

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first concealer I have used that actually stays in place all day long! Dermaflage doesn’t budge or transfer. It takes a little while to learn how to blend it in and you have to work quick because it will set fast. A little bit goes a long way. I occasionally get deep, cystic acne pimples along my jawline that are almost always red and inflamed, and Dermaflage can completely conceal my blemishes and it looks so natural! I’m a nurse and Dermaflage outlasts my 12+ hour shifts at the hospital! Definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Karl Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Latex, coconut allergy friendly
customer_reviews.text: Pro quality concealer. Dries quickly so work fast and you’ll have lasting coverage. Haven’t had a reaction even with my latex protein and coconut allergy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent concealer
customer_reviews.text: I love the 3 different colors - I blend with my fingers, then dab on face and smooth out with the brush. Instructions were very helpful re applying a small amount , letting it 'dry' for 30 seconds or so and the reapplying as necessary. I use only on my face where I have noticeable acne scars - or should I say HAD noticeable scars!
customer_reviews.author: CMV

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the product. It works! I have bad malasma in the summer . Nothing works to remove them. I haven’t found anything to hide them. This stuff works! I did a tiny coat (u brush it on) it dries fast and hid them!!! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: nOUSHIN HORNBUCKLE

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage
customer_reviews.text: I love that it comes with 3 different colors so you can customize your shade. It does stay on very well and will cover any rock like paper
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it waterproof, but lasts literally for days...it has to be scrubbed off. Had a horrible bruise on my knee from roller skating and it completely covered it up. I did not believe how great it worked
customer_reviews.author: Kim Coscia

customer_reviews.title: coverage that stays with the right color palate
customer_reviews.text: finally! the right color and it stays on! I also add a dab of my face foundation. I actually use it on my toes to hide corn damage from high heels. Good for people of color!
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t cover as well as it says and it not a smooth cover. It doesn’t blend well with your skin. Bummer, I was really hoping this was going to be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t conceal.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because it was recommended by Dermaflage for my purpose. It didn’t work for me. It simply did not conceal. L’Oreal Infallible is the best I have found so far.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: It’s terrible. I am writing to the company and planning to call Amazon as well Within a short time it was completely dried up and of no use. The brush it came with became unusable after a few applications.
customer_reviews.author: robin scarella

customer_reviews.title: concealer flaked on my face
customer_reviews.text: I just did not like, did not wok for me.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Ralston

customer_reviews.title: Hard to apply
customer_reviews.text: I disliked this product because it would dry up to fast and make my make up look thick and uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Be be

customer_reviews.title: Did not look natural
customer_reviews.text: No, it did not work very well. I was not happy.all, the colors were too dark for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Actual colors do not match colors shown on line
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to cover scars. Let me admit that is difficult to buy products like this on line, when the colors shown on line do not represent the colors as they really are. So, the colors did not match my skin tones, even when blended. In addition, such small amounts were given. If you have a large coverage area, don’t buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Serena S.

customer_reviews.title: Covers my scars well
customer_reviews.text: This makeup does stay on well, I have multiple scars from breast reconstruction , I can wear low cut dresses without it coming off on my clothes or showing the scars. It’s nice that it has three colors so you can blend to match your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Haida Carr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Really. I have 3 Keloids on my butt for a pimple on my last pregnancy and it bothers me a lot. I tried everything to get rid of it but no success. So I decided put makeup on it. I tried many brands but allll stain my clothes and it doesn’t stays on my skin for so long. So I tried this one and OMG! I love it. Stay all day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: Rough material feels chocky on face. It doesn’t spread evenly. If you make a mistake like putting the wrong shade - difficult to remove even with a wet close. It is way over priced — not worth it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Maher

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover a bad bruise on my hand. Didn't expect much. It actually does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Anne L. Watson

customer_reviews.title: It is good
customer_reviews.text: I just love this full coverage concealed palette it cove up my dark under eyes will be buying again
customer_reviews.author: shirley washington

customer_reviews.title: Worst Concealer Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this company’s over priced Dermaflage scar filler and it was complete garbage and did not work or ever look right, so I should have known better that to try this concealer palate. I have a lot of acne scars and have literally tried every possible concealer out there and this was by far the worst concealer I have ever used. It did not cover anything, did not blend at all. Way over priced for low quality concealer. The people that have left good reviews have obviously not tried other concealers to know better. This is the worst make up product I have ever bought period. Do not waste your time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

product_meta.title: Full Coverage Concealer Palette, Waterproof Concealer Cream, 3 Colors + Brush, by Dermaflage
product_meta.description: Color:MediumFull Coverage Concealer Cream is specially formulated to block out the toughest discolorations on the face & body. Each palette contains 3 colors and brush to blend for the perfect match. Waterproof and Long-Lasting Cream will cover dark circles under eyes, age spots, tattoos, bruises, acne, scars, redness, hyperpigmentation. Super Pigmented so that a little bit does the job. It dries to a matte finish that does not smudge or rub off. Stays in place until you take it off with makeup remover. Unlike other concealers, there is no setting powder or spray needed for it to last 12+ hours. Paraben, gluten and cruelty free.
feature_bullets: Full Coverage Concealer Palette, 3 colors + Brush, blend for the perfect match
Waterproof Concealer: provides full coverage with high pigment. Non-greasy formula dries quickly to a matte finish, no setting powder needed
Face & body concealer cream for acne, dark circles, age spots, tattoos, bruises, scars, redness, hyperpigmentation
Waterproof Concealer: smudge proof concealer will not rub off on clothes and lasts all day
Easy Shade Matching: each palette has 3 colors – choose from 4 options: Light, Medium, Tan, Dark
